abstract: Antiaircraft fire launched by Houthi rebels against Saudi airstrikes in Yemen has reportedly killed or maimed many civilians.
lead_paragraph: Antiaircraft munitions fired by Yemen’s Houthi rebels have killed or maimed scores of civilians in Sana.

headline.main: Yemen: Amnesty Says Antiaircraft Fire by Houthis Has Killed Many Civilians
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: Amnesty Says Antiaircraft Fire by Houthis Has Killed Many Civilians

snippet: Antiaircraft munitions fired by Yemen’s Houthi rebels have killed or maimed scores of civilians in Sana.
